p: Several bioactive compounds are present in mushrooms, such as cinnamic acid, ergosterol, and p-coumaric, p-hydroxybenzoic and protocatechuic acids. The bioactive compounds with special pharmacological value present in shiitake mushroom are lentinan [C 42H 72O 36], eritadenine or lentinacin [C 9H 11N 5O 4], and ergotamine [C 33H 35N 5O 5] ( Ribeiro etÂ al., 2006).
